title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-9.5 - Gas control system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-9.5 - Gas control system

State Regulations

Landfill gas management systems are required for all
facilities upon closure, and must be designed and constructed in accordance
with the requirements of Subpart 363-6 of this Part, as
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-9.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
